name: Long Gropes - Brown
description:
We use a high-quality vegetable tanned cowhide from Italy. Leather ages beautifully – a natural quality we value. It is a leather that stays flexible and moulds to its job.

As with all leather, it should be treated to retain its quality. We recommend Brooks Proofide Saddle Treatment, or a similar clear leather dressing. This will also create a better grip.

*If the bar end plugs are too small for your handlebars, try trapping the ends of the laces in the gap. Double the lace if necessary.

–

Fitting instructions »

Gropes Gallery »

–

Product specification

Leathers grips (L50.4cm x W8.0cm)
laces (214cm)
Bar end plugs*

*If the bar end plugs are too small for your handlebars, try trapping the ends of the laces in the gap. Double the lace if necessary.

–

name: Long Gropes – Red
description:
We use a high-quality vegetable tanned cowhide from Italy. Leather ages beautifully – a natural quality we value. It is a leather that stays flexible and moulds to its job.

As with all leather, it should be treated to retain its quality. We recommend Brooks Proofide Saddle Treatment, or a similar clear leather dressing. This will also create a better grip.

name: Gropes D-Lock Cover – Honey
description:
Gropes D-Lock cover is an individual and eye-catching accessory for the bike customisation enthusiast. Designed to match our handlebar grips, this unique leather cover offers protection for both your lock and frame.

–

Suitable* for the following models:

Kryptonite Evolution Mini 4
Kryptonite Evolution Mini 7
Kryptonite Evolution Series 4 Standard
Kryptonite KryptoLok Series 2 Mini 7
Kryptonite KryptoLok Series 2 Standard

–

Fitting instructions »

Gropes D-lock Cover Gallery »

–

Product specification

Leathers grips (L51.8cm x W4.5cm)
laces (214cm)

*While not listed above, D-locks with similar dimensions may also fit. We will continually check the other major makers for compatibility and update this list. If in doubt, please contact us for advice.

Note: We offer a bespoke leather cutting service. Please contact us for more details.

–

Choose your laces below:

name: Gropes bar end plugs
description:
Our bar end plugs are made in the UK from natural cork. Both plugs feature a screen printed Gropes monogram.

The diameter of the end plugs is 19mm, which should be suitable for most bikes. Trapping the ends of the laces in the gap if plugs are too smal for your handlebar. Double the lace if necessary.

Gropes Bar End Plugs Gallery »
